meanings.definition: A condition characterized by an abnormally low level of sugar in the blood.
meanings.sent1: She felt weak and dizzy due to hypoglycemias.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hypoglycemias.
meanings.sent3: The hypoglycemias made her crave sweets like never before.
meanings.sent4: His performance on the field suffered from the hypoglycemias of energy.
meanings.sent5: The hypoglycemias caused her to feel lightheaded and confused.

meanings.definition: The state of having an insufficient amount of glucose in the bloodstream.
meanings.sent1: The hypoglycemias in his body required immediate attention.
meanings.sent2: Her hypoglycemias were evident from the pale color of her skin.
meanings.sent3: Despite his hypoglycemias, he managed to finish the race.
meanings.sent4: The hypoglycemias in the system affected his concentration.
meanings.sent5: The hypoglycemias caused her to feel shaky and unwell.
